message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its potential benefits for you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, my original offer considers the true value and potential this product holds for you.  I could meet you halfway at $11,250. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
